original_text: I will destroy all their houses, the homes that they live in during the winter, and the ones that they live in during the summer. I will completely destroy all their big, beautiful houses, with their valuable things made from ivory.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 겨울 궁과 여름 궁을 치리니 상아 궁들이 파괴되며 큰 궁들이 무너지리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will destroy all their houses
the homes that they live in during the winter
and the ones that they live in during the summer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 여름 동안 사는 집들

sentences.original_text: I will completely destroy all their big, beautiful houses
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 모든 크고 아름다운 집들을 완전히 파괴하겠다

sentences.original_text: with their valuable things made from ivory
That is what the Lord says
